41236.name: Total net enrolment rate, primary, gender parity index (GPI)
41236.description: Ratio of female total net enrolment rate for primary to the male total net enrolment rate for primary. It is calculated by dividing the female value for the indicator by the male value for the indicator. A GPI equal to 1 indicates parity between females and males. In general, a value less than 1 indicates disparity in favor of males and a value greater than 1 indicates disparity in favor of females.
41236.s_name: World Bank EdStats: Total net enrolment rate, primary, gender parity index (GPI)
